thread.title: CROUSE/EUFEMIA SOLOMON
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by CROUSE/EUFEMIA SOLOMON

author: CROUSE/EUFEMIA SOLOMON
title: CROUSE/EUFEMIA SOLOMON
text: We were very pleased with the personalized approach shown to us. Leachim was exceptional in providing a variety of flights with the prices and giving us many choices in the flights to the Philippines. He understood the needs I have as a blind and handicapped person.
